title: Southwestern sections of Pax Christi Germany call for a permanent nuclear phase-out (Pax Christi International) ...
text: ( Source : Pax Christi International ) In a press release on 7 October, southwestern sections of Pax Christi Germany ( Freiburg , Rottenburg-Stuttfart, Speyer) called on politicians and the economy to promote a permanent nuclear phase-out in
